title: My Hero Academia Team Up Mission
alternative_title: 僕のヒーローアカデミア チームアップミッション -Team up mission-,My Hero Academia: Team Up Mission
status: 僕のヒーローアカデミア チームアップミッション -Team up mission-,My Hero Academia: Team Up Mission
description:
Description :
        A new serialized spin-off of My Hero Academia focusing on Deku and friends fighting together along with Pro Heroes. Written and illustrated by Yoco Akiyama, author of the Melissa Shield one-shot titled “Kitto Daremo ga Dareka no Hero” (Everyone is Surely Someone's Hero) and the Watashi no Hero Academia 4-koma spin-off.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 2: Mission 2: Infiltration! The Fastest Hero
Chapter 1: Mission 1: Start A New Mission
